Title: The Unintentional Kidnapping of Mrs. Elfriede Ott
Writer: Uwe Lubrich (screenplay), Michael Ostrowski (screenplay), Andreas Prochaska, Alfred Schwarzenberger (screenplay)
Actors: Elfriede Ott, Michael Ostrowski, Andreas Kiendl, Gerhard Liebmann
Plot: Horst receives the monthly pension from his grandmother. The only problem is, that she is dead. As a local politician wants to congratulate the grandmother to her birthday Horst "borrows" ...
